name: Dungeon Dreams: Forsaken
description: You are a traveling Mercenary in the Medieval Times. Mostly you get small jobs, like getting a stolen item back, or spying on the police to back them up on a minor operation. Today, you got your biggest job yet. Your client had a large, priceless collection of diamonds stolen by some monsters. The monsters were seen heading into a cave dungeon. That's where you are heading now. Made by bowserx19!
